name: desktop-mascot-mcp
description: MCP Server for desktop mascot with VRM 3D character, TTS voice synthesis, and emotion expressions

scripts.build: tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json
scripts.build:electron: tsc -p tsconfig.main.json && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && tsc -p tsconfig.preload.json && npm run copy:assets && npm run rename:cjs
scripts.copy:assets: powershell -Command "Copy-Item src/renderer/VRM.html dist/renderer/ -Force; Copy-Item assets dist/renderer/ -Recurse -Force; Copy-Item config.json dist/renderer/ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
scripts.rename:cjs: powershell -Command "Remove-Item dist/main/index.cjs -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Rename-Item dist/main/index.js -NewName index.cjs"
